bioconda.name: alder
bioconda.summary: The ALDER software computes the weighted linkage disequilibrium (LD) statistic for making inference about population admixture

biocontainers.name: alder
biocontainers.summary: The ALDER software computes the weighted linkage disequilibrium (LD) statistic for making inference about population admixture

biotools.summary: alder detects and dates population admixtures based on patterns of linkage disequilibrium.

bioschemas.summary: alder detects and dates population admixtures based on patterns of linkage disequilibrium.
